content.prompt: In an influential 1947 article, diplomat George F. Kennan advocated that the United States should

choices.label: invade the Soviet Union to establish democracy
adopt a more conciliatory policy toward the Soviet Union
conduct covert activities in underdeveloped countries to undermine communist movements
focus its foreign policy on containing the spread of Soviet communism

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
